message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. I believe it's a game-changer and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us started.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on this product. I would like to propose a price of $950000 to make this deal more appealing.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000 to make it a win-win for both of us. I believe the product's value will only continue to grow, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
